column2: "All right, you've passed that test as well. Is something the matter? Do you harbor doubts as to your ability?"
"It's only natural to question your development right about now, but I assure you, you are making steady progress."
"You've got to overcome this special trial and continue onto the next. There's no way you won't manage it!"
"Well then, I expect to see you at the next boot camp."
